info.name: MTU API
info.description:
**MTU API** provides endpoints to perform MTU transaction. Typical flow consists of calling 3 endpoints:

*/config* to get suggested countries and information about recent transactions,
*/offers* to get available offers and
*/mtu* to execute the actual transaction.

Due to asynchronous nature of MTU transaction execution, the actual result is delivered to client via push
notifications, MQTT and APNS/FCM. The content field inside the message attachment is of type **Transaction**.

Attachment content type value for the MTU case is **x-idtm/json;type=imtu-event-v2**.

Clients will typically check the **status** field value inside **Transaction** struct to decide whether transaction
succeed of failed. Possible **status** field values are:

- success - purchase ok
- failed - purchase failed
- queued - 3DS pending, or fulfillment queued on the provider side
- scheduled - purchase scheduled in the future

When the status is **queued**, the clients should the 3DS flow should be triggered. In this case the **error_reason** will be **cvv_pending**.


When the status is **failed**, the clients should check the **error_reason** to determine the exact cause. The default
error reason is **failed**.

Payment errors:

- limit_exceeded
- failed_card_declined
- failed_card_expired
- failed_no_credit
- failed_lost_or_stolen_cc
- failed_card_restricted
- failed_invalid_card_info
- failed_invalid_card_number
- missing_card
- cvv_required
- 3ds_pending
- 3ds_required
- 3ds_failed

Purchase errors:

- topup_too_soon
- topup_limit_reached
- invalid_msisdn
- invalid_msisdn_or_wrong_carrier
- msisdn_not_active
- msisdn_not_prepaid
- invalid_product
- missing_product
- carrier_problem_contact_carrier
- invalid_account_type

JVM purchase errors:

- unknown
- invalid_recharge_amount_contact_carrier
- product_unavailable
- verify_with_recipient
- ineligible_plan
- carrier_problem_try_again
- product_price_changed

query.description: mtu or voucher, nil for mtu

request.description: Get MTU configuration, including history of MTU transactions and list of suggested countries.

response.name: List of past MTU transactions and list of suggested countries

query.description: mtu or voucher, nil for mtu

request.description:
Execute MTU transaction. While MTU transaction consists of several steps, this endpoint returns result of the very initial step only -
posting transaction authorization request. Actual authorization and fulfillment operations will be executed in asynchronous way
and result will be delivered to the client via Push Notification channel.
